title: X to block Grok AI from undressing images of real people
description: The Grok AI tool on Elon Musk's X will no longer be able to undress pictures of real people, the company has announced. "We have implemented technological measures to prevent the Grok account from allowing the editing of images of real people in revealing clothing such as bikinis," said a statement. "This restriction applies to all users, including paid subscribers."

title: Child porn concerns prompt California to launch investigation into Elon Musk's AI firm
description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. — California announced an investigation Wednesday into Elon Musk's xAI, with Gov. Gavin Newsom accusing the artificial intelligence company of becoming a "breeding ground for predators to spread nonconsensual sexually explicit AI deepfakes." Grok, the xAI chatbot, includes...

title: Why Rezolve AI Stock Trounced the Market Today
description: The company made a dramatic change to its revenue guidance, a move very much noticed by analysts and investors.

title: AI Impact Summit exhibition relocated to Bharat Mandapam over security concerns
description: The “Innovation Festival” was originally scheduled to run from February 15 to 20 at Central Park and is one of several events planned alongside the main summit.
